Name: Slurpy Derpy
About the game: Slurpy Derpy is an incremental idle clicker game that lets you take control of Derps and breed them to repopulate the world with the help of the gods! Craft cookies, research new abilities, conquer maps to claim resources, hunt for Slurpies and evolve completely new species as you work towards the ultimate goal of creating the most powerful creatures the world has ever seen! Install now and start crafting weird Derps in one of the most addicting idle clicker games!
Meta Title: Slurpy Derpy: Mar 16, 2022, Scary Bee LLC and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Slurpy Derpy? Check out the release date (Mar 16, 2022), developer insights from Scary Bee LLC, and a complete game summary.
